long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Rooftop Snipers is an exciting and addictive game available as a Chrome Extension. It can also be played for free on the website https://1v1lol.org/. In this game, you take on the role of a sharpshooter positioned on a rooftop, and your objective is to eliminate your opponent in fast-paced sniper duels.

The gameplay is simple yet challenging. You and your opponent will be standing on separate rooftops, and you must carefully aim and shoot at each other using your sniper rifle. The rooftop setting adds an extra layer of strategy as you must consider factors like wind direction and bullet drop.
